nodes.text: Gorths were a type of creature with a tail that attracted flies. When Rebel pilot Norra Wexley flew through the innards of the second Death Star during the Battle of Endor she mentally compared the TIE/ln space superiority starfighters that swarmed after her to flies on a gorth's tail.
Gorths were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
